name: supertitle
description: The smaller title to display above the main hero title.

name: title
description: The main title of the hero. If set, then `headingLevel` also needs to be set.

name: headingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>`.

name: headingSize
description: The physical size of the hero title (`xl`, `l`, `m` or `s`).

name: body
description: The HTML for the main body of the hero. Not displayed if `text` is set.

name: text
description:
The text for the hero which will be inserted into a `

` element. Overwrites `body` if it is set.

name: imageSrc
description: The URL of the hero image.

name: imageAlt
description: Alternative text for the image in the event that it canâ€™t be displayed.

name: imageWidth
description: The width of the image in pixels.

name: imageHeight
description: The height of the image in pixels.

params.name: type
params.description: The MIME type of the image.

params.name: media
params.description: A conditional media rule for the image.

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the image in pixels.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the image in pixels.

name: imageCaption
description: An optional caption for the hero image, displayed under an expandable section in the top right.

name: actions
description: An array of actions to add at the bottom of the hero component. Each action is displayed as a button.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title for the action.

params.name: icon
params.description: The name of a Font Awesome icon, without the `fa-` prefix.

params.name: rightAlignIcon
params.description: If `true`, align the icon to the right hand side of the button.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the hero action.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the hero action.

name: style
description: The style of hero to use. This can be `contrast`, `tint` or `accent`.

name: layout
description: An alternative layout of the hero component to use. This can be `shift` or `split`.

name: narrow
description: If `true`, use a narrower style hero image.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the hero.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the hero.
